level.text: The contracting officer shall send written notice of award to the successful bidder.
The contracting officer shall publish notice of contract awards in accordance with the requirements of chapter 13 of this title.
The contracting officer shall notify unsuccessful bidders promptly in writing that their bids were not accepted, and shall return any bid security to the unsuccessful bidders.
